metadata.titleCn: 祁连山综合观测网：黑河流域地表过程综合观测网（张掖湿地站涡动相关仪-2021）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the Zhangye wetland station eddy covariance system (EC) in the midstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2021. The site (100.44640° E, 38.97514° N) was located in the Zhangye City in Gansu Province. The elevation is 1460 m. The EC was installed at a height of 5.2 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (Gill&Li7500A) was 0.25 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 3% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. 
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (z/L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2021年1月1日至2021年12月31日的黑河水文气象观测网中游张掖湿地站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市，下垫面是湿地。观测点的经纬度是100.44640E, 38.97514N，海拔1460.00m。涡动相关仪的架高5.2m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（Gill）与CO2/H2O分析仪(Li7500A)之间的距离是25cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区大约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域已被先前研究者发现为碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展具有重要意义。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频发，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013）、咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，风速和风向的梯度；空气压力、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站——2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Example.AnswerCn: 用于监测绿洲-沙漠生态系统中碳交换的数据收集方法之一是涡度协方差系统，它测量半小时的湍流通量数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced in collecting hydrometeorological data in arid inland river basins?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱内陆河流流域收集水文气象数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge faced in collecting hydrometeorological data in arid inland river basins is the ecological environment degradation, such as drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, and intensification of land desertification.
Example.AnswerCn: 在干旱内陆河流流域收集水文气象数据时面临的一个挑战是生态环境的恶化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化以及土地沙漠化加剧。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset that includes energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个包含干旱地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测的示例数据集？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset includes energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations from the middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin, available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子包括来自黑河流域中下游的能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据，这些数据可从国家西藏高原数据中心获取。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the challenges faced in maintaining data quality for hydrometeorological observations in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，维护水文气象观测数据质量面临的挑战有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: erroneous data filtering, data exclusion around precipitation events, gaps in 10Hz raw data exceeding 10% in a 30-minute interval, atmospheric stability evaluation, turbulence similarity characteristics, nine data quality levels, first three levels considered good
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 错误数据过滤、降水事件的数据排除、30分钟间隔内超过10%的10Hz原始数据缺失、大气稳定性评估、湍流相似性特征、九个数据质量等级，前三个等级被认为是好的。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What attributes are commonly recorded in datasets focused on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert systems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在关注绿洲-沙漠系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据集中，通常记录的属性包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: wind direction, horizontal wind speed, lateral wind speed standard deviation, sonic temperature, water vapor density, carbon dioxide concentration, friction velocity, Obukhov length, sensible heat fluxes, latent heat fluxes, carbon dioxide flux, quality flag ranging from 1 to 9
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 风向、水平风速、横向风速标准差、声速温度、水汽密度、二氧化碳浓度、摩擦速度、Obukhov长度、感热通量、潜热通量、二氧化碳通量、质量标志范围从1到9

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many flux and meteorological stations have been established in the oasis–desert areas of the HRB since 2012?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，HRB的绿洲-沙漠地区建立了多少个通量和气象站？

Quantification.QuestionEn: Over what duration were the observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems collected?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集收集的时间跨度是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'eddy covariance system' mean in the context of data collection for oasis–desert ecosystems?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统的数据收集上下文中，“涡度协方差系统”指的是一种用于测量和分析气体交换（如二氧化碳和水蒸气）的方法。该系统通过测量风速和气体浓度的变化，能够提供关于生态系统碳和水循环的重要信息。
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a data collection method used to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data, which includes energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes. It is instrumental in understanding the exchanges of these elements in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种数据采集方法，用于获取半小时的湍流通量数据，包括能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量。它在理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中这些元素的交换方面具有重要作用。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'data processing and quality control procedure' in hydrometeorological data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在水文气象数据收集中，“数据处理和质量控制程序”是指对收集到的数据进行整理、分析和验证的过程，以确保数据的准确性和可靠性。
Definition.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control procedure refers to the steps involved in data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing. This procedure ensures the reliability and accuracy of hydrometeorological data, including radiation, soil heat flux, and other environmental parameters.
Definition.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制程序是指数据收集、数据处理以及数据归档和共享的步骤。该程序确保水文气象数据的可靠性和准确性，包括辐射、土壤热通量和其他环境参数。

Definition.QuestionEn: How is 'oasis–desert system' defined in the context of ecological and socioeconomic research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在生态和社会经济研究的背景下，“绿洲–沙漠系统”是如何定义的？
Definition.AnswerEn: An oasis–desert system is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas, crucial for maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity. It plays a significant role in carbon balance and supports the socioeconomic development of oases, particularly in western China.
Definition.AnswerCn: 绿洲-沙漠系统是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，对于维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力至关重要。它在碳平衡中发挥着重要作用，并支持绿洲的社会经济发展，特别是在中国西部。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in data processing and quality control procedures between datasets collected in arid inland river basins and those from other climate regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在干旱内陆河流流域收集的数据与其他气候区域的数据在数据处理和质量控制程序方面有哪些差异？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In arid inland river basins, data processing involves specific steps like despiking, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, and various corrections for frequency response and density effects. Quality control includes screening for instrument errors and data gaps. These procedures may differ from other climate regions where atmospheric conditions and environmental factors vary, possibly requiring different corrections and quality assessments.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在干旱内陆河流流域，数据处理涉及特定步骤，如去尖峰、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转以及频率响应和密度效应的各种校正。质量控制包括筛查仪器错误和数据缺口。这些程序可能与其他气候区域有所不同，因为大气条件和环境因素的变化，可能需要不同的校正和质量评估。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the integration of hydrometeorological data with vegetation and soil parameters in oasis-desert systems compare to other ecosystems in terms of dataset comprehensiveness and utility?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，水文气象数据与植被和土壤参数的整合在数据集的全面性和实用性方面与其他生态系统相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In oasis-desert systems, datasets integrate hydrometeorological data with vegetation and soil parameters to provide a comprehensive view of ecosystem dynamics, aiding in understanding energy, water, and carbon exchanges. This integration may differ in other ecosystems where the focus might be more on specific parameters like soil moisture or vegetation type, depending on the primary environmental challenges and research goals of those ecosystems.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，数据集将水文气象数据与植被和土壤参数整合在一起，以提供生态系统动态的全面视角，帮助理解能量、水和碳的交换。这种整合在其他生态系统中可能会有所不同，重点可能更多地放在特定参数上，如土壤湿度或植被类型，这取决于这些生态系统的主要环境挑战和研究目标。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do the methodological steps such as coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and density correction in data processing influence the quality and accuracy of flux measurements in wetland ecosystems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 方法步骤如坐标旋转、频率响应校正和密度校正在数据处理中的应用如何影响湿地生态系统中通量测量的质量和准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The methodological steps like coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and density correction are crucial in ensuring the accuracy of flux measurements. Coordinate rotation aligns the data with the mean wind direction, minimizing errors due to misalignment. Frequency response correction adjusts for losses in high-frequency data capture, improving the signal fidelity. Density correction accounts for temperature and pressure variations, ensuring that the fluxes are accurately quantified. These steps collectively enhance the quality of the processed data, making them reliable for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange dynamics in wetland ecosystems.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 方法步骤如坐标旋转、频率响应修正和密度修正在确保通量测量的准确性方面至关重要。坐标旋转将数据与平均风向对齐，最小化因不对齐而导致的误差。频率响应修正调整高频数据捕获中的损失，提高信号的保真度。密度修正考虑温度和压力的变化，确保通量的准确量化。这些步骤共同提高了处理数据的质量，使其在理解湿地生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换动态方面变得可靠。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in maintaining long-term data collection networks in arid and semi-arid regions, and how can these be mitigated to ensure consistent data quality?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，维护长期数据收集网络可能会面临哪些挑战，以及如何减轻这些挑战以确保数据质量的一致性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in maintaining long-term data collection networks in arid and semi-arid regions include ecological degradation, such as drying rivers and intensified desertification, which can affect instrumentation and data continuity. Mitigating these challenges involves regular maintenance of equipment, strategic siting of observation stations to avoid extreme conditions, and employing robust data processing techniques to handle any gaps or errors in the data. Ensuring local community involvement and integrating remote sensing data can also provide supplementary insights and improve the resilience of data collection efforts.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，维护长期数据收集网络面临的挑战包括生态退化，例如河流干涸和沙漠化加剧，这可能影响仪器设备和数据连续性。缓解这些挑战的方法包括定期维护设备、战略性地选择观测站位置以避免极端条件，以及采用稳健的数据处理技术来处理数据中的任何缺口或错误。确保当地社区的参与和整合遥感数据也可以提供补充见解，并提高数据收集工作的韧性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can the integration of auxiliary data, such as vegetation and soil parameters, enhance the interpretation of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert systems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 辅助数据的整合，例如植被和土壤参数，可以通过以下方式增强对绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的解释：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of auxiliary data, such as vegetation and soil parameters, provides a more comprehensive understanding of the factors influencing energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert systems. Vegetation data can inform on the photosynthetic activity and water use efficiency, while soil parameters reveal insights into moisture retention and heat fluxes. This holistic approach allows for more accurate modeling of ecological interactions and supports the assessment of ecosystem resilience and sustainability in these regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 辅助数据的整合，如植被和土壤参数，提供了对影响绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换因素的更全面理解。植被数据可以提供光合作用和水分利用效率的信息，而土壤参数则揭示了水分保持和热通量的洞察。这种整体方法允许对生态相互作用进行更准确的建模，并支持对这些地区生态系统韧性和可持续性的评估。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it important to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems in data collection efforts?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在数据收集工作中，保持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡是重要的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Maintaining a balance is crucial to achieve sustainable oasis development and to understand the interactions between oasis and desert systems. This balance helps support ecological security and socioeconomic development while contributing to goals like carbon peaking and carbon neutrality.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 保持平衡对于实现可持续的绿洲发展以及理解绿洲与沙漠系统之间的相互作用至关重要。这种平衡有助于支持生态安全和社会经济发展，同时为实现碳达峰和碳中和等目标做出贡献。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the underlying challenges in collecting long-term observational datasets in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域收集长期观测数据集的潜在挑战是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges include environmental degradation issues such as drying rivers, vegetation degradation, desertification, and frequent dust storms, which complicate the collection and maintenance of long-term datasets in these regions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 挑战包括环境退化问题，如河流干涸、植被退化、沙漠化和频繁的沙尘暴，这些问题使得在这些地区收集和维护长期数据集变得复杂。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of utilizing a 10Hz sampling frequency in eddy covariance systems on the quality and reliability of flux data in wetland ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在湿地生态系统中，使用10Hz采样频率的涡度协方差系统对通量数据的质量和可靠性可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using a 10Hz sampling frequency in eddy covariance systems allows for high-resolution data that can capture detailed turbulence characteristics necessary for accurate flux measurements. This high frequency enables more precise delay time corrections, coordinate rotation, and frequency response adjustments, leading to improved data quality and reliability for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in wetland ecosystems.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在涡度协方差系统中使用10Hz的采样频率可以获得高分辨率数据，捕捉到详细的湍流特征，这对于准确的通量测量是必要的。这种高频率使得更精确的延迟时间校正、坐标旋转和频率响应调整成为可能，从而提高了数据质量和可靠性，有助于理解湿地生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the application of data processing steps such as coordinate rotation and frequency response correction affect the interpretation of energy and carbon flux data in arid and semiarid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 数据处理步骤如坐标旋转和频率响应校正的应用，可能会如何影响对干旱和半干旱地区能量和碳通量数据的解释？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The application of data processing steps like coordinate rotation and frequency response correction is crucial for refining the raw data obtained from eddy covariance systems. These steps help minimize errors associated with misalignment and sensor response issues, thereby enhancing the accuracy of energy and carbon flux interpretation. This is particularly important in arid and semiarid regions where precise measurements are needed to understand the complex interactions within oasis–desert ecosystems.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 数据处理步骤的应用，如坐标旋转和频率响应校正，对于精炼从涡度协方差系统获得的原始数据至关重要。这些步骤有助于最小化与传感器对齐和响应问题相关的误差，从而提高能量和碳通量解释的准确性。这在干旱和半干旱地区尤为重要，因为精确的测量对于理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统内复杂的相互作用是必需的。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it essential to maintain long-term observations in the context of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，维护能源、水蒸气和碳交换的长期观测是至关重要的。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to focus on the balance between oasis and desert systems in the context of sustainable development?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在可持续发展背景下，关注绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems is critical to achieving the goal of sustainable oasis development and understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要，了解这些生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征对于实现碳达峰和碳中和的目标也非常重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the specific steps involved in processing eddy covariance data to ensure its quality and usability in hydrometeorological observations?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn:
处理涡度协方差数据以确保其质量和在水文气象观测中可用的具体步骤包括：

1. 数据采集：使用涡度协方差系统收集气象和气体浓度数据。
2. 数据预处理：对原始数据进行去噪声、去除异常值和填补缺失值。
3. 校准：对传感器进行校准，以确保测量的准确性。
4. 质量控制：应用质量控制标准，识别和剔除低质量数据。
5. 数据合并：将不同传感器的数据进行合并，确保时间和空间上的一致性。
6. 计算涡度协方差：根据收集的数据计算涡度协方差，以获取气体通量。
7. 结果验证：通过与其他观测数据进行比较，验证计算结果的可靠性。
8. 数据存档：将处理后的数据存档，以便后续分析和使用。
9. 数据共享：根据需要将数据共享给相关研究人员和机构，以促进科学研究。
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The processing of eddy covariance data involves steps such as despiking to remove outliers, time delay correction, coordinate rotation (double rotation), frequency response correction, sonic virtual temperature correction, and WPL density correction. Quality evaluation of flux values is performed through tests for atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics. Additionally, data is filtered to remove periods of instrument error, data surrounding precipitation events, and data with more than 10% missing values in 10Hz raw data over 30 minutes.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差数据的处理涉及多个步骤，如去尖峰以去除异常值、时间延迟修正、坐标旋转（双旋转）、频率响应修正、声学虚温修正和WPL密度修正。通过对大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征的测试，对通量值进行质量评估。此外，数据还会被过滤，以去除仪器错误期间的数据、降水事件周围的数据，以及在30分钟内10Hz原始数据中缺失值超过10%的数据。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodologies are employed to ensure the quality control and validation of flux measurements in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，确保通量测量质量控制和验证的方法论有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Methodologies for quality control and validation include the application of Eddypro software to process raw data into 30-minute averages, with specific quality control steps such as despiking, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, and various corrections for response, temperature, and density. The quality of the processed flux data is further evaluated through atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity tests, and data is selectively filtered based on instrument errors, precipitation events, and data loss criteria.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 质量控制和验证的方法包括使用Eddypro软件将原始数据处理为30分钟平均值，具体的质量控制步骤包括去尖峰、时间延迟修正、坐标旋转，以及对响应、温度和密度的各种修正。处理后的通量数据的质量进一步通过大气稳定性和湍流相似性测试进行评估，并根据仪器误差、降水事件和数据丢失标准对数据进行选择性过滤。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the use of Eddypro software enhance the processing and quality control of turbulent flux data collected from eddy covariance systems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: Eddypro软件如何增强从涡度协方差系统收集的湍流通量数据的处理和质量控制。
Enablement.AnswerEn: Eddypro software enhances the processing and quality control of turbulent flux data by performing steps such as outlier removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density correction, alongside quality evaluation based on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics.
Enablement.AnswerCn: Eddypro软件通过执行异常值去除、延迟时间校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正、超声虚拟温度校正和密度校正等步骤，增强了湍流通量数据的处理和质量控制，同时基于大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征进行质量评估。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological setups and environmental conditions are necessary for establishing effective land surface flux and meteorological stations in arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区建立有效的地表通量和气象站所需的技术设置和环境条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Effective land surface flux and meteorological stations in arid regions require technological setups such as eddy covariance systems with specified configurations, automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data, and the capability for long-term monitoring. The environmental conditions include situating stations in regions that represent typical oasis-desert interactions, as well as ensuring the availability of auxiliary data for comprehensive analysis.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 有效的土地表面通量和气象站在干旱地区需要技术设置，如具有特定配置的涡度协方差系统、用于水文气象数据的自动气象站，以及长期监测的能力。环境条件包括将站点设置在代表典型绿洲-沙漠相互作用的区域，以及确保有辅助数据可用于全面分析。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems while collecting data in arid and semi-arid regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区收集数据时，保持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡是重要的。
Expectation.AnswerEn: It is critical to maintain this balance to achieve sustainable oasis development. Understanding the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is essential to achieve carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals, which support ecological security and sustainable development.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 保持这种平衡对于实现可持续的绿洲发展至关重要。理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标至关重要，这支持生态安全和可持续发展。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the anticipated challenges in collecting hydrometeorological data in inland river basins of arid regions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区内陆河流流域收集水文气象数据的预期挑战是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in these regions face ecological degradation challenges such as drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, which can complicate data collection efforts.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域面临生态退化的挑战，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，这些都可能使数据收集工作变得复杂。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might long-term observational datasets be indispensable in understanding oasis–desert interactions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据集在理解绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用中可能是不可或缺的。
Expectation.AnswerEn: Long-term datasets are crucial for quantitatively understanding the interactions between energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems, which is significant for protecting ecological stability and supporting socioeconomic development.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 长期数据集对于定量理解这些生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换之间的相互作用至关重要，这对保护生态稳定性和支持社会经济发展具有重要意义。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What is your evaluation of the methods used for data quality control and processing in data collection techniques related to oasis-desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对与绿洲-沙漠系统相关的数据收集技术中使用的数据质量控制和处理方法的评估是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The methods used for data quality control and processing in data collection techniques related to oasis-desert systems appear to be rigorous and comprehensive. The use of Eddypro software for processing includes multiple corrective measures such as despiking, delay time correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and density correction. Additionally, quality evaluation involves checks for atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity, which indicates a thorough approach to ensuring data reliability.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在与绿洲-沙漠系统相关的数据收集技术中，所使用的数据质量控制和处理方法显得严谨而全面。使用Eddypro软件进行处理，包括多项纠正措施，如去尖峰、延迟时间修正、坐标旋转、频率响应修正和密度修正。此外，质量评估涉及对大气稳定性和湍流相似性的检查，这表明在确保数据可靠性方面采取了全面的方法。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are your thoughts on the potential for expanding datasets related to energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert areas for future research?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 我对在绿洲-沙漠地区扩展与能源、水蒸气和碳交换相关的数据集的潜力进行未来研究的看法是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Expanding datasets related to energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis-desert areas holds significant potential for future research. Long-term and diverse data collection from various stations, including superstations and ordinary stations, can provide valuable insights into ecosystem interactions and environmental changes. Additionally, integrating data from different geographical locations and time periods could enhance the understanding of these systems' dynamics and contribute to sustainable development strategies in arid regions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 扩展与绿洲-沙漠地区能源、水汽和碳交换相关的数据集对未来研究具有重要潜力。来自不同站点（包括超级站和普通站）的长期和多样化数据收集可以提供有关生态系统相互作用和环境变化的宝贵见解。此外，整合来自不同地理位置和时间段的数据可以增强对这些系统动态的理解，并有助于干旱地区可持续发展战略的制定。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data collection from eddy covariance systems can ensure accuracy and reliability given the complex environmental conditions in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，涡度协方差系统的数据收集如何能够确保准确性和可靠性，因为环境条件非常复杂。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Eddy covariance systems collect data by measuring turbulent fluxes at high frequencies (such as 10Hz) and then processing these into averaged values over periods like 30 minutes. The data processing involves steps like outlier removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and density correction to ensure the data's accuracy and reliability. Quality evaluation is conducted based on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity tests, and data are filtered to exclude readings affected by instrument errors or precipitation.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统通过以高频率（如10Hz）测量湍流通量来收集数据，然后将这些数据处理成如30分钟的平均值。数据处理涉及多个步骤，如异常值去除、延迟时间校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正和密度校正，以确保数据的准确性和可靠性。质量评估基于大气稳定性和湍流相似性测试进行，数据会被过滤以排除受仪器错误或降水影响的读数。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure how vegetation and soil parameters are integrated into energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange datasets in semi-arid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定植被和土壤参数是如何融入半干旱地区的能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据集中的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Vegetation and soil parameters are integrated into datasets by collecting auxiliary data alongside the main flux measurements. This includes hydrometeorological data, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, air temperature and humidity gradients, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles. This comprehensive approach allows for a detailed understanding of the interactions between the land surface and atmosphere.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 植被和土壤参数通过收集辅助数据与主要通量测量集成到数据集中。这包括水文气象数据、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面。这种综合方法使我们能够详细了解地表与大气之间的相互作用。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't figure out how datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems are managed and shared for research purposes.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法弄清楚人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的数据集是如何管理和共享以供研究使用的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Datasets from oasis–desert systems are managed through a structured process involving data collection, processing, and quality control procedures. The processed and quality-checked data is then archived and made available for research purposes through data centers, such as the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center, ensuring accessibility for further research and analysis.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 来自绿洲-沙漠系统的数据集通过一个结构化的过程进行管理，包括数据收集、处理和质量控制程序。经过处理和质量检查的数据随后被归档，并通过数据中心（如国家西藏高原数据中心）提供给研究用途，确保进一步研究和分析的可访问性。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the methodologies involved in collecting and processing energy, water vapor, and carbon flux data in arid and semiarid oasis-desert systems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在干旱和半干旱绿洲-沙漠系统中收集和处理能量、水蒸气和碳通量数据的方法论。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methodologies involve using eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for acquiring half-hourly turbulent flux data. Hydrometeorological data, including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles, are observed through automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period. The data processing involves steps like data collection, processing, archiving, and sharing.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据。水文气象数据，包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面，通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期进行观测。数据处理包括数据收集、处理、归档和共享等步骤。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify and discuss the challenges associated with maintaining long-term observation datasets in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别并讨论在干旱和半干旱地区内陆河流流域维护长期观测数据集所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include ecological environment degradation, such as river and lake drying, natural vegetation degradation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms in inland river basins, particularly westward along the Silk Road in areas like the Tarim River basin, Aral Sea basin, and Lake Urmia basin.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧，以及内陆河流域频繁发生的沙尘暴，特别是在丝绸之路沿线向西的地区，如塔里木河流域、咸海流域和乌尔米耶湖流域。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please suggest potential strategies for expanding or refining datasets on energy and carbon exchange in oasis-desert areas to support ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请建议潜在的策略，以扩展或完善关于绿洲-沙漠地区能源和碳交换的数据集，以支持生态稳定和社会经济发展。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential strategies include expanding the network of land surface flux and meteorological stations beyond the current 11 stations, increasing the temporal resolution of measurements, incorporating more vegetation and soil parameter data, and utilizing remote sensing technologies to complement existing ground-based observations.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的策略包括在当前11个站点的基础上扩展地表通量和气象站网络、提高测量的时间分辨率、增加更多的植被和土壤参数数据，以及利用遥感技术来补充现有的地面观测。
